explanation: [0-0] In a bright blue kitchen, a little boy is standing on the yellow wooden floor, wearing a green T-shirt and red pants, holding a jar of peanut butter. In the lower right corner of the screen, there is a purple circular logo with the English letters "SMOL" on it, and a white word "GERMAN" on a red background below.

[0-2] A woman in a red shirt and white jeans walks towards the boy from the right side of the screen. She walks behind the little boy, bends down, reaches out her left hand, and takes the peanut butter. The woman puts the peanut butter in her right hand, extends her left index finger, and shakes it up and down. The little boy looks at the peanut butter with his fingers clasped.

[2-4] Then, the woman stands up, lifts her head, switches the peanut butter to her left hand, and stands on tiptoe with her left foot slightly off the ground. The camera zooms in as the woman places the peanut butter on the silver mat on top of the kitchen cabinet.
